quote_first: Kaufman placed his hands together as if in prayer, and when his prayer was answered, he said, “I’ll need to make a few phone calls before I come to a final decision, so come back to my office at
quote_last: tomorrow afternoon. If I’m convinced, we’ll take it from there.”
title: Mightier Than the Sword
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: P.M. Besta sang another hymn. Everyone knew something was wrong. How long did they wait? The mayor was going crazy inside, as was the mayor’s wife, as was their daughter. Seiji could barely contain his rage. He was turning as red as his red tuxedo.
title: Trouble & Triumph: A Novel of Power & Beauty
author: Tip "T.I." Harris with David Ritz
